name: Mercury
desc: Mercury is the closest planet to the Sun.

name: Venus
desc: Venus is the second planet from the Sun.

name: Earth
desc: Earth is our home, the third planet from the Sun.

name: Mars
desc: Mars is known as the Red Planet.

name: Jupiter
desc: Jupiter is the largest planet in our solar system.

name: Saturn
desc: Saturn is famous for its beautiful rings.

name: Uranus
desc: Uranus is an ice giant with a tilted axis.

name: Neptune
desc: Neptune is the eighth and farthest planet from the Sun.
